html:
The Visitor Economy

This module introduces students to the key principles of the visitor economy. It examines the influence of economic factors on consumer demand and considers the influence of the external environment of tourism businesses and consumers. It also examines the economic impacts of the visitor economy on destinations and community. The module will foster the development of key intellectual, practical and transferable skills.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Demonstrate understanding of the nature, structure and contribution of the visitor economy at a range of scales

+  Understand the influence of economic factors on consumer demand.

+  Demonstrate knowledge and understanding of how the external environment influences tourism businesses and consumers, and be able to interpret how changes in the external environment might influence the visitor economy.

+  Demonstrate understanding of the economic impacts of the visitor economy, both positive and negative, on destinations and their communities

Module Content:
